text: While not exactly related to the future of coding, I found this insight into coding in biology very interesting to see what’s possible to encode with a few characters in different combinations: <https://berthub.eu/articles/posts/reverse-engineering-source-code-of-the-biontech-pfizer-vaccine/|https://berthub.eu/articles/posts/reverse-engineering-source-code-of-the-biontech-pfizer-vaccine/>
